title: Local PR/branch automation + auto-merge policy enforcement
goal: Automate branch creation, commits, PR creation (if remote exists), and safe auto-merge when gates + canary pass.
steps: Implement git branch/commit helpers and a queue for local-only mode.
If `gh` is available and a remote exists, create PRs automatically.
Implement policy checks: required gates, required evidence, forbidden file patterns.

rollback.strategy: Disable auto-merge and revert integration tooling changes.
